custom-sql:
SELECT opencps_statistic.* FROM opencps_statistic WHERE (opencps_statistic.month = ?) AND (opencps_statistic.year = ?) AND (opencps_statistic.domainCode = ?) AND (opencps_statistic.govAgencyCode = ?) AND (opencps_statistic.groupAgencyCode = ?) AND (opencps_statistic.groupId = ?) ORDER BY month DESC
SELECT opencps_statistic.* FROM opencps_statistic WHERE (opencps_statistic.month = ?) AND (opencps_statistic.year = ?) AND (opencps_statistic.system = ?) AND (opencps_statistic.domainCode = ?) AND (opencps_statistic.govAgencyCode = ?) AND (opencps_statistic.groupAgencyCode = ?) AND (opencps_statistic.groupId = ?) ORDER BY month DESC
SELECT opencps_dossier.* FROM opencps_dossier WHERE (opencps_dossier.registerBookCode = ?) AND (opencps_dossier.processNo = ?) AND (opencps_dossier.serviceCode = ?) AND (opencps_dossier.govAgencyCode = ?) AND (opencps_dossier.applicantIdType = ?) AND (opencps_dossier.applicantIdNo = ?) AND (opencps_dossier.cityCode = ?) AND (opencps_dossier.districtCode = ?) AND (opencps_dossier.wardCode = ?) AND (opencps_dossier.contactTelNo = ?) AND (opencps_dossier.contactEmail = ?) AND (opencps_dossier.delegateIdNo = ?) AND (opencps_dossier.delegateTelNo = ?) AND (opencps_dossier.dossierStatus = ?) AND (opencps_dossier.dossierSubStatus = ?) AND (opencps_dossier.dossierActionId = ?) AND (opencps_dossier.viaPostal = ?) AND (opencps_dossier.online_ = ?) AND (opencps_dossier.serverNo = ?) AND (opencps_dossier.originDossierId = ?) AND (opencps_dossier.originality = ?) AND (opencps_dossier.releaseDate IS NULL OR [$SPECIFY_RELEASE_DATE$]) AND (opencps_dossier.groupId = ?) AND (opencps_dossier.receiveDate >= ?) AND (opencps_dossier.dossierStatus != 'denied' OR opencps_dossier.dossierStatus != 'cancelled') AND (opencps_dossier.releaseDate IS NOT NULL) AND (opencps_dossier.dueDate IS NOT NULL) AND (opencps_dossier.extendDate IS NOT NULL) AND (opencps_dossier.extendDate > opencps_dossier.dueDate) AND (opencps_dossier.dueDate IS NULL) OR (opencps_dossier.releaseDate <= opencps_dossier.dueDate) AND (opencps_dossier.dossierStatus = 'procesing' OR opencps_dossier.dossierStatus = 'interoperating') AND (opencps_dossier.dueDate IS NULL OR opencps_dossier.dueDate > ?) AND (opencps_dossier.originDossierId = 0 AND opencps_dossier.dossierActionId != 0)
SELECT opencps_voting_statistic.* FROM opencps_voting_statistic WHERE (opencps_voting_statistic.month = ?) AND (opencps_voting_statistic.year = ?) AND (opencps_voting_statistic.votingCode = ?) AND (opencps_voting_statistic.domainCode = ?) AND (opencps_voting_statistic.govAgencyCode = ?) AND (opencps_voting_statistic.groupId = ?) ORDER BY month DESC
//anh
select votingCode, subject, sum(case when selected = 1 then numberSelected*2 when selected = 2 then numberSelected*1 when selected = 3 then numberSelected*0 else 0 end) as point from (select OV.votingCode, OV.subject, OVR.selected, count(*) as numberSelected from opencps_voting OV left join opencps_votingresult OVR on OV.votingId = OVR.votingId and (OVR.createDate BETWEEN ? AND ?) and OV.groupId = OVR.groupId where OV.classPK !=0 and OV.groupId = ? group by OV.votingId, OVR.selected) as abc group by votingCode
SELECT opencps_person_statistic.* FROM opencps_person_statistic WHERE (opencps_person_statistic.month = ?) AND (opencps_person_statistic.year = ?) AND (opencps_person_statistic.votingCode = ?) AND (opencps_person_statistic.employeeId = ?) AND (opencps_person_statistic.govAgencyCode = ?) AND (opencps_person_statistic.groupId = ?) ORDER BY month DESC
SELECT opencps_statistic_manual.* FROM opencps_statistic_manual WHERE (opencps_statistic_manual.month = ?) AND (opencps_statistic_manual.year = ?) AND (opencps_statistic_manual.domainCode = ?) AND (opencps_statistic_manual.govAgencyCode = ?) AND (opencps_statistic_manual.groupAgencyCode = ?) AND (opencps_statistic_manual.groupId = ?) ORDER BY month DESC
SELECT opencps_statistic_manual.* FROM opencps_statistic_manual WHERE (opencps_statistic_manual.month = ?) AND (opencps_statistic_manual.year = ?) AND (opencps_statistic_manual.system = ?) AND (opencps_statistic_manual.domainCode = ?) AND (opencps_statistic_manual.govAgencyCode = ?) AND (opencps_statistic_manual.groupAgencyCode = ?) AND (opencps_statistic_manual.groupId = ?) ORDER BY month DESC
UPDATE opencps_statistic SET opencps_statistic.reporting = ? WHERE (opencps_statistic.groupId = ?) AND (opencps_statistic.month = ?) AND (opencps_statistic.year = ?)
SELECT opencps_statistic_mgt.* FROM opencps_statistic_mgt WHERE (opencps_statistic_mgt.month = ?) AND (opencps_statistic_mgt.year = ?) AND (opencps_statistic_mgt.domainCode = ?) AND (opencps_statistic_mgt.govAgencyCode = ?) AND (opencps_statistic_mgt.groupId = ?) ORDER BY month DESC
SELECT opencps_statistic_mgt.* FROM opencps_statistic_mgt WHERE (opencps_statistic_mgt.month = ?) AND (opencps_statistic_mgt.year = ?) AND (opencps_statistic_mgt.domainCode = ?) AND (opencps_statistic_mgt.govAgencyCode = ?) AND (opencps_statistic_mgt.groupId = ?) AND (opencps_statistic_mgt.groupBy = ?) ORDER BY month DESC
